displayName.text: Northwell Health Physician Partners at Greenwich Village

formattedAddress: 7 7th Ave 2nd & 3rd Floor, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 7 7th Ave 2nd & 3rd Floor, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: their service here has been consistently good for both cardiology and pulmonology.   The front office and support staff is courteous and responsive.   They typically pick up the phone quickly.

text.text: their service here has been consistently good for both cardiology and pulmonology.   The front office and support staff is courteous and responsive.   They typically pick up the phone quickly.

originalText.text: Terrible experiences and will not return though it's in my neighborhood. Was taken by ambulance to er and waited 3 hours for an x-ray. Then returned to see a doctor in the orthopedic department and waited for an hour, insulted by the woman at the desk. The doctor scheduled a zoom today and I waited for 20 minutes, then he called to say he had a problem. I told him he's the only doctor I've ever seen who can't be reached by phone. "I don't have time to take calls," he said. I pointed out doctors have someone to do that and he apologized. I would avoid this place at all costs.

text.text: Terrible experiences and will not return though it's in my neighborhood. Was taken by ambulance to er and waited 3 hours for an x-ray. Then returned to see a doctor in the orthopedic department and waited for an hour, insulted by the woman at the desk. The doctor scheduled a zoom today and I waited for 20 minutes, then he called to say he had a problem. I told him he's the only doctor I've ever seen who can't be reached by phone. "I don't have time to take calls," he said. I pointed out doctors have someone to do that and he apologized. I would avoid this place at all costs.

originalText.text: Great health service but the paperwork part of the operation is absolutely terrible. I've been trying for months to get an itemized bill. They sent me one but not the other and after multiple requests I still have nothing. They say they will mail it out in 7 to 10 days, but never happens. Try again, never happens, try once more still nothing. Try asking by email instead same story. Tried asking if they can email it, but they can't. I tried asking if I can go to an office somewhere and pick up a physical copy myself, no response. Terrible. I'm screwed now, was supposed to submit to my FSA to be reimbursed but now won't be able to as the deadline is coming up while I sit at home and wait for the mailman to deliver some mail from Northwell Health that will never arrive.

originalText.text: Service staff not friendly, impossible to get in contact with after sending bills that make no sense. Save your money and go somewhere else if you can

originalText.text: very pleased with the staff and MD’s here. the intake was very thorough. overall experience was very professional.
